reviews.review_msg: A very cute and sweet professor.  He has the most amusing sense of humour. His relaxed manner makes you feel at ease. A great professor.

Great teacher, extremely knowledgeable and well-researched, classes and readings are always interesting and he's very respectful of students' opinions. One of the best profs I've had. Take his classes if you get the chance, you won't regret it.

i thought he was great until he marked papers. Very vague in what he asks for and if you dont like pollack or db nichols or pearl jam don't bother going to class- also big on hand outs at the end of the term i had 3 booklets full of this crap
Incredible. He's brilliant! That says it best! Thanx fr a great class, Carl!
This guy marks hard if you try to make a good paper, best way to an A, use big words that he might not understand and then try to write a paper that is as intangable as his lectures.
He looks like a cross between woody allen and john cleese.  He's a nice guy and teaches interesting classes.
What a great educator. He was always supportive and constructive in his comments. It is because of you that I decided to follow my heart and become an English teacher. Thanks Paul.(:
stuck in the idiom of acadamia this prof is really all about teaching.

Her grading criteria is non existent. Her expectations about what is needed seem to be completely arbitrary. When you ask for clarification it is not given and anything she does say is passive aggressive. Her lectures add absolutely nothing to the text. The course would be the same if it had no prof.
the course is alright but don't expect your efforts to reflect in your grade.  she is so hard to please and critiques everything about your work.
looks like she wrote her own comments here.  they all have good grammar and start with great.  or maybe she's just that good of an english teacher.
Nice guy, decent marker. I'd take one of his classes again over others.

Great Sasha has come to SFU!  I took a class with her when she was teaching at Malaspina and she is awesome. Will definitely shake this place up.  Watch out for the wicked sense of humour (and oh, yeah, high expectations) ...
Hard marker. Will pick on you. Don't take this class unless you're willing to really work for it.
prof was pretty funny during lectures, made the class very chill. The writing of couple of essays was fairly easy. The final was easy, questions given beforehand. would recommend.

Sophie is one of those professors whose young appearance and bubbly attitude obscures a brilliant mind.  Take her upper division courses with smaller class size.  Very bright, fun, enthusiastic.  A joy to go to class.  Beware: she has definite expectations about quality writing (and rightly so).
